body_html: The code looks good, but we're still hardly doing any checks (only in requires_grad + set_requires_grad), so it's trivial to shoot yourself in the foot, and it's incompatible with our previous API in a way that will cause segfaults.
body_text: The code looks good, but we're still hardly doing any checks (only in requires_grad + set_requires_grad), so it's trivial to shoot yourself in the foot, and it's incompatible with our previous API in a way that will cause segfaults.
body: The code looks good, but we're still hardly doing any checks (only in `requires_grad` + `set_requires_grad`), so it's trivial to shoot yourself in the foot, and it's incompatible with our previous API in a way that will cause segfaults.
